I am Technical Lead of Data Science at [Jumping Rivers](https://www.jumpingrivers.com). I’m an active communicator and a statistical ambassador for the Royal Statistical Society. I’m an #RStats geek and co-organise the Lancaster chapter of R-Ladies. When I’m not at a laptop, you’ll find me outdoors. I love cycling, sea kayaking, fell running and climbing.
